Using my serial startup and executive experience to help other Entrepreneurs achieve success!◉ CEO Coaching Services.◉ Team Development, Leadership and Mentoring.◉ Strategic Consulting, including business plan & sales strategy development.◉ Advising new businesses on formation of corporations and business structures.◉ Investor Pitch Deck Development.◉ Raise Early & Late Stage Seed Capital.◉ Design, Product Engineering & Development.◉ Negotiation & Deal Structuring.◉ Website & Mobile Development: Word Press, iOS, Swift, tvOS, macOS, Android.◉ Brand development, web site traffic growth, web site UI and advertising revenue. ◉ Conduct onsite and offsite classes.
Investment Readiness Program, Director | Mentor | EIR | Pitch Coach

Using my serial startup and executive experience to help other Entrepreneurs achieve success!◉ Investment Readiness Program, Director◉ Team Development, Leadership, and Mentoring◉ Investor Pitch Deck Development◉ Raise Early & Late Stage Seed Capital

◉ CEO Coaching Services.◉ Team Development, Leadership and Mentoring.◉ Strategic Consulting, including business plan & sales strategy development.◉ Advising new businesses on formation of corporations and business structures.◉ Investor Pitch Deck Development.◉ Raise Early & Late Stage Seed Capital.◉ Design, Product Engineering & Development.◉ Negotiation & Deal Structuring.◉ Website & Mobile Development: Word Press, iOS, Swift, tvOS, macOS, Android.◉ Brand development, web site traffic growth, web site UI and advertising revenue. ◉ Conduct onsite and offsite classes.

• A venture capital backed start up company which has successfully raised $86M to bring a new Random Access Memory (RAM) technology to market, with the potential to displace both high performance Static RAM (SRAM) as well as high density Dynamic RAM (DRAM) in both discrete and embedded applications. As of August 2005, we are completing the characterization of our first product on our first generation discrete SRAM products to be introduced later this year.

• Full P&L management of SRAM Design, Engineering & Marketing• Grew division from $20M to $120M run rate @ 40% gross margin• Managed set up of offshore Operations including Fab, Assembly & Test• Managed set up of NSC in Portland Maine as USA on shore foundry• Managed Engineering teams in USA, India and Taiwan• Became #1 world supplier in three quarters on one product family• Established two new memory product segments targeted at Networking &Communications

Earned my Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering, while I worked my way through school, working at several jobs over my 5 years in school. The jobs I worked at during college had a strong influence towards landing my first job as a Design and Product Engineer at Mostek Corporation (Semiconductors) in Dallas, TX!

summary: ◉ CEO & Startup Coaching Services & Products - "Helping You Build the Company You Want"◉ TampaBayWaVE.org Accelerator: Mentor+EiR+Pitch Coach; ◉ Serial Entrepreneur: 1 IPO + 2 M&A; ◉ Software Developer: Web, WordPress, Swift, ObjC, tvOS, macOS (27+ Apps); ◉ BEE Georgia Institute of Technology. ◉ Helping others solve their toughest challenges are what I enjoy doing each day. ◉ I enjoy helping other entrepreneurs, friends, and family and my 5 days/week, 2 hours/day workouts at the YMCA with my wife. I see a big part of my future in giving back by teaching life and work skills to those who are looking to improve themselves and have a better life in which they can do the same. ◉ Follow me on Twitter: @ideatogrowth - Check out what I'm up to on my website and blog: at https://IdeaToGrowth.com     Expertise:◉ CEO Coaching Services.◉ Team Development, Leadership, and Mentoring.◉ Strategic Consulting, including business plan & sales strategy development.◉ Advising new businesses on formation of corporations and business structures.◉ Investor Pitch Deck Development.◉ Raise Early & Late Stage Seed Capital.◉ Design, Product Engineering & Development.◉ Negotiation & Deal Structuring.◉ Website & Mobile Development: Word Press, iOS, Swift, tvOS, macOS, Android.◉ Brand development, web site traffic growth, web site UI and advertising revenue. ◉ Conduct onsite and offsite classes.[Keywords: Coach, Investor, Entrepreneur ,Startup, Incubator, Accelerator, Mentor, Web, Design, WordPress, iOS, Swift, OSX, MacOS, iPhone, iPad, Mac, MacBook, iPod, iTouch, Software, Apple, Developer, Games, Apps, CEO, VP, Software, TiE, TampaBayWaVE]
